org.spf4j.concurrent

Class FileBasedLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.concurrent.FileBasedLock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Lock

    public final class FileBasedLock
extends Object
implements Lock, Closeable
    File based Lock implementation, that can be used as IPC method.
    Author:
    zoly
